TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ApplicationFactory implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Factory

summary.span: 提供可用于在应用程序级外接程序中执行杂项任务（如扩展本机 Word 文档以及在运行时创建功能区控件）的方法。

span.span: Provides methods you can use to perform miscellaneous tasks in application-level add-ins, such as extending native Word documents and creating Ribbon controls at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取对象, 请使用`Globals.Factory`项目中的属性。To get an object, use the `Globals.Factory` property in your project. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[对 Office 项目中对象的全局访问](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects)。For more information, see [Global Access to Objects in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Action CreateAction(string caption) cil managed

param.name: caption
param.span: 智能标记菜单显示的操作的名称。

span.span: The name of the action, which is displayed by the smart tag menu.

Docs.summary: 创建一个 对象，该对象表示智能标记的一个操作。Creates a object that represents an action for a smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Word 外接程序项目中创建智能标记和操作。The following code example demonstrates how to create a smart tag and an action in a Word add-in project. 若要使用此示例，请在 `ThisAddIn` 类中运行代码。To use this example, run the code from the `ThisAddIn` class. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordSmartTags#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/CS/thisdocument.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordSmartTags#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/VB/thisdocument.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SmartTag CreateSmartTag (string smartTagType, string caption, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ISmartTagExtension extension = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SmartTag CreateSmartTag(string smartTagType, string caption, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ISmartTagExtension extension) cil managed

param.name: smartTagType
param.span: 智能标记的唯一标识符，由命名空间 URI 和标记类型名组成，两部分之间用数字符号 (#) 分隔。

span.span: A unique identifier for the smart tag, composed of a namespace URI and a tag type name separated by a number sign (#).

param.name: caption
param.span: 智能标记菜单上显示的智能标记的名称。

span.span: The name of the smart tag, which is displayed on the smart tag menu.

param.name: extension
param.span: 一个扩展对象，用于为智能标记定义自定义识别器。

span.span: An extension object that defines a custom recognizer for the smart tag.

Docs.summary: 创建一个 对象，该对象表示文档中的一个智能标记。Creates a object that represents a smart tag on a document. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `smartTagType`参数的有效字符串的一个示例是http://smarttags.contoso.com#TagName。An example of a valid string for the `smartTagType` parameter is http://smarttags.contoso.com#TagName. 格式正确的智能标记类型字符串不包含空格, 并且以字母 (a-z, a-z)、下划线 (_) 或冒号 (:) 开头。A well-formed smart tag type string does not contain white space, and it starts with a letter (a-z, A-Z), an underscore (_) or a colon (:). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Word 外接程序项目中创建智能标记和操作。The following code example demonstrates how to create a smart tag and an action in a Word add-in project. 若要使用此示例，请在 `ThisAddIn` 类中运行代码。To use this example, run the code from the `ThisAddIn` class. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordSmartTags#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/CS/thisdocument.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordSmartTags#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/VB/thisdocument.vb#7)]

exception.span: 或 为 或为空，或者 无效。

span.span: or is either or empty, or is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document GetVstoObject(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document document) cil managed

param.name: document
param.span: 要扩展的本机文档对象。

span.span: The native document object to extend.

param.span: 虽然此参数的类型是 ，但通常会将 对象传递到此方法。

span.span: Although this parameter is of type , you typically pass a object to this method.

summary.span: 返回 主机项，它将展开指定本机文档对象的功能。

span.span: Returns a host item that extends the functionality of the specified native document object.

returns.span: 一个主机项，可扩展当前本机文档对象的功能。

span.span: A host item that extends the functionality of the native document object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序级外接程序中调用此方法以自定义在 Word 中打开的任何文档。Call this method in an application-level add-in to customize any document that is open in Word. 如果尚未生成此类对象, 则此方法将生成新的对象。This method generates a new object if no such object has already been generated. 对此方法的后续调用会返回现有对象的缓存实例。Subsequent calls to this method return the cached instance of the existing object. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time). > [!NOTE] > 如果设置为 "宏已启用" 或 "默认禁用宏", VSTO 将遵循 "自动化安全" Office 组策略设置。VSTO follows the “Automation Security” Office group policy setting when it is set to “Macros enabled” or “Disable Macros by default”. 但是, 如果设置设置为 "使用应用程序宏安全级别", VSTO 将始终允许自动化运行, 而不考虑应用程序设置。However, VSTO will always allow automation to run if the setting is set to “Use application macro security level”, regardless of the application setting. 若要阻止 VSTO 允许自动化运行, 请选择 "默认情况下禁用宏" 设置。To prevent VSTO from allowing automation to run, choose the “Disable Macros by default” setting. > > 参数的类型为, 它是的父接口。 `document`The `document` parameter is of type , which is the parent interface of . 因此, 此方法可接受两种类型的对象 : 和。Therefore, this method can accept objects of both types: and . 通常, 当你引用 Word 文档时, 你将使用。Typically, when you reference a Word document, you use a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建活动 Word 文档的主机项。The following code example creates a host item for the active Word document. 然后, 该示例将添加到文档中。The example then adds a to the document. 若要使用此代码, 请从以`ThisAddIn` [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或为[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]目标的 Word 外接程序项目中的类运行它。To use this code, run it from the `ThisAddIn` class in a Word add-in project that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordAddIn_Extensions#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordAddIn_Extensions/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordAddIn_Extensions#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordAddIn_Extensions/vb/ThisAddIn.vb#1)]

param.name: document
param.span: 要测试的本机文档对象。

span.span: The native document object to test.

param.span: 虽然此参数的类型是 ，但通常会将 对象传递到此方法。

span.span: Although this parameter is of type , you typically pass a object to this method.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否为指定本机文档对象创建了 主机项。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a host item has been created for the specified native document object.

returns.span: 如果已为指定的 对象创建了 主机项，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if a host item has been created for the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在应用程序级外接程序中调用此方法, 以测试在关闭或保存 Word 文档之前是否存在您要保留的托管控件。You can call this method in an application-level add-in to test for the existence of managed controls that you want to persist before closing or saving the Word document. 有关演示如何在 Word 文档中保存控件的示例, 请参阅[Word 外接程序动态控件示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab98787c-121e-4d23-8bce-746ae69ebaef)。For a sample that demonstrates how to persist controls in a Word document, see [Word Add-In Dynamic Controls Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab98787c-121e-4d23-8bce-746ae69ebaef). > [!NOTE] > 参数的类型为, 它是的父接口。 `document`The `document` parameter is of type , which is the parent interface of . 因此, 此方法可接受两种类型的对象 : 和。Therefore, this method can accept objects of both types: and . 通常, 当你引用 Word 文档时, 你将使用。Typically, when you reference a Word document, you use a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查当前文档是否具有关联的主机项, 如果有, 则将获取宿主项。The following code example checks whether the current document has an associated host item and, if so, it gets the host item. 如果文档中存在托管控件, 则此示例将显示一条警告消息, 通知用户在保存文档时将不会持久保存托管控件。If managed controls exist in the document, the example displays a warning message that informs the user that the managed controls will not be persisted when saving the document. 此代码示例使用事件的事件处理程序来执行检查。This code example uses the event handler of the event to perform the check. 若要使用此代码, 请从以`ThisAddIn` [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或为[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]目标的 Word 外接程序项目中的类运行它。To use this code, run it from the `ThisAddIn` class in a Word add-in project that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordAddIn_Extensions#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordAddIn_Extensions/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordAddIn_Extensions#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordAddIn_Extensions/vb/ThisAddIn.vb#2)]
